comments:
I created a new JOnAS 4.1.4 server instance, and when I started it (even when 
nothing is deployed on it) - I got the following exception:

org.objectweb.jonas.server.Server reflection error : 
java.io.FileNotFoundException: Cannot find properties for D:\JOnAS-4.1.4
\conf\conf\jonas.properties
java.io.FileNotFoundException: Cannot find properties for D:\JOnAS-4.1.4
\conf\conf\jonas.properties
	at org.objectweb.jonas.common.JProp.readPropsFile(JProp.java:342)
	at org.objectweb.jonas.common.JProp.readFile(JProp.java:316)
	at org.objectweb.jonas.common.JProp.<init>(JProp.java:171)
	at org.objectweb.jonas.common.JProp.getInstance(JProp.java:202)
	at org.objectweb.jonas.server.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:70)

Actually the problem is on my side - not the right path to the JOnAS 
configuration directory :)
Verifying bug on behalf of reporter.
